var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("GET", "/server/poll", true); xhr.onreadystatechange = function () { if(xhr.readyState === XMLHttpRequest.DONE && xhr.status === 200) { if (xhr.responseText == "false") { } else if(xhr.responseText == "ping") { window.alert("Ping sent to server, received here"); } else { var ser = new SnapSerializer(); var ide_morph = world.children[0]; ser.project = ide_morph; var resp = xhr.responseText; var sprite = ser.loadValue(ser.parse(resp)); ide_morph.sprites.add(sprite); ide_morph.corral.addSprite(sprite); // Fire off hats, may make more sense to break out later sprite.allHatBlocksFor('__shout__go__').forEach( function(block) { ide_morph.stage.threads.startProcess(block); }); } } }; xhr.send();
var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "/server/postsprite", true); xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-length", str.length); xhr.setRequestHeader("Connection", "close"); xhr.send(str);
